onlyForOwners: This command is for project owners only!
onlyForAdmins: This command is for project administration only!
commandCooldown: You must wait **{cTime}** before using the **{cName}** command!
invalidVersionCore: To run the '{name}' module, update the kernel from '{version}' to the required '{require}'!
executeError: {e} | An unexpected error occurred while executing the **{cmd}** command!

server.info: Allows you to view server information
server.notPlayers: There are no players on the server...

modules.invalidFile: The file '{file}' is not a full DiscordSM module!
modules.invalidExecFile: The '{folder}' folder does not have the 'index.js' executable required for DiscordSM modules!
modules.invalidSettings: The '{folder}' folder does not have the settings file 'settings.json' required for DiscordSM modules!
modules.invalidModule: Module '{name}' cannot be started due to invalid interface structure!

permissions.messages: I don't have enough permissions to send messages on the server!
permissions.embeds: I don't have enough permissions to send embed messages on the server!
permissions.missingUser: {user}, you do not have sufficient permissions to use this command!
permissions.missingClient: I don't have enough permissions to run this command!
